timeline.bodyText: There was nasty bug here which prevented timer deletion because the to-be-deleted TimerData had a different timestamp than the original timer, leading to not actually deleting the timer from the map.
timeline.author: mxm

timeline.bodyText: It seems strange that the deprecated method is the one being used, and the recommended method is not implemented.
timeline.author: ibzib

replies.bodyText: yeah, actually that might have been a mistake when the timer family was added because the old way was to use TimerData and the new way is to use timerId/timerFamily.
replies.author: mxm

replies.bodyText: Maybe worth a JIRA/refactor? I'll leave it up to you since I am not as familiar with this code.
replies.author: ibzib
